    Interdisciplinary Materials Group at Tohoku University

    We focus on solid-state theory, simulation, and machine learning for quantum materials.

    Research Topics

    AI/ML for Materials

    Keywords: Graph neutral network, Diffusion model, High-throughput calculation

    Photonics in Materials

    Keywords: Raman spectra, Photovoltaics, Photocatalysis, Second harmonic generation, Excitons effect

    Thermoelectricity

    Keywords: Seebeck effect, Electrical conductivity, Thermal conductivity, Carrier mobility, Low‐dimensional materials

    Strain Engineering

    Keyworks: Artificial muscles, Ideal strength, Nanomechanics, Electromechanics
